mapper.sql: app_name, app_type, version, app_path, issuance_time, remark, create_time, update_time, delete_flag, verrify_state, accesskey
mapper.insert: insert into sys_app (app_name, app_type, version, app_path, issuance_time, remark, create_time, update_time, delete_flag, verrify_state, accesskey) values (#{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuanceTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{verrifyState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accesskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_app
app_name,
app_type,
version,
app_path,
issuance_time,
remark,
create_time,
update_time,
delete_flag,
verrify_state,
accesskey,

mapper.update:
update sys_app
app_path = #{appPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issuance_time = #{issuanceTime,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
verrify_state = #{verrifyState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
accesskey = #{accesskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and app_type = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
